statements: SELECT * FROM farm_fields WHERE crop_type = 'Corn';
SELECT field_id, crop_type FROM farm_fields WHERE planting_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT field_id, harvest_yield FROM farm_fields WHERE harvest_yield >= 1000;
SELECT * FROM farm_fields ORDER BY planting_date DESC;
SELECT AVG(harvest_yield) AS average_yield FROM farm_fields WHERE crop_type = 'Wheat';
SELECT field_id, crop_type, planting_date, harvest_yield FROM farm_fields WHERE crop_type = 'Corn' ORDER BY planting_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM farm_fields WHERE planting_date >= '2022-01-01' AND planting_date <= '2022-06-30';
SELECT field_id, planting_date, harvest_yield FROM farm_fields WHERE harvest_yield > 100 ORDER BY harvest_yield DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT crop_type FROM farm_fields;
SELECT AVG(harvest_yield) AS average_yield, MIN(harvest_yield) AS min_yield, MAX(harvest_yield) AS max_yield FROM farm_fields;
SELECT * FROM CropInformation;
SELECT crop_name, planting_date FROM CropInformation ORDER BY planting_date DESC;
SELECT field_name, planting_date, harvest_yield FROM FieldInformation WHERE harvest_yield > 100 ORDER BY planting_date ASC;
SELECT crop_name, harvest_yield FROM CropInformation WHERE harvest_yield IS NOT NULL;
SELECT field_name, crop_name FROM FieldInformation INNER JOIN CropInformation ON FieldInformation.crop_id = CropInformation.crop_id;
SELECT * FROM CropInformation WHERE crop_name = 'Corn';
SELECT crop_name, planting_date FROM CropInformation WHERE harvest_yield > 1000 ORDER BY planting_date DESC;
SELECT field_name, planting_date, harvest_yield FROM FieldInformation WHERE planting_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY harvest_yield DESC;

SELECT crop_name, planting_date, harvest_yield FROM CropInformation JOIN FieldInformation ON CropInformation.crop_id = FieldInformation.crop_id WHERE FieldInformation.field_name LIKE '%Field%' ORDER BY harvesting_yield ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT crop_name FROM CropInformation WHERE crop_name <> 'Tomato';
SELECT * FROM crop_types;
SELECT crop_name, crop_description FROM crop_types WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, crop_name, crop_description FROM crop_types ORDER BY crop_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM planting_dates WHERE planting_season = 'Spring';
SELECT crop_id, SUM(yield_amount) AS total_yield FROM harvest_yields GROUP BY crop_id ORDER BY total_yield DESC;
SELECT * FROM crop_types WHERE id = 1;
SELECT crop_name, crop_description FROM crop_types WHERE crop_name = 'Tomato';
SELECT crop_name, planting_date, planting_season FROM crop_types JOIN planting_dates ON crop_types.id = planting_dates.crop_id;
SELECT crop_name, yield_amount, yield_date FROM crop_types JOIN harvest_yields ON crop_types.id = harvest_yields.crop_id;
SELECT crop_name, yield_amount FROM crop_types JOIN harvest_yields ON crop_types.id = harvest_yields.crop_id WHERE yield_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM crop_types;
SELECT id, name FROM crop_types ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT name, description FROM crop_types WHERE id = 2;
SELECT * FROM planting_dates WHERE planting_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT crop_id, SUM(yield_kg) AS total_yield FROM harvest_yields GROUP BY crop_id ORDER BY total_yield DESC;
SELECT name, description FROM crop_types;
SELECT * FROM planting_dates WHERE planting_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT field_id, SUM(yield_kg) AS total_yield FROM harvest_yields GROUP BY field_id;
SELECT crop_id, COUNT(*) AS harvest_count FROM harvest_yields WHERE harvest_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' GROUP BY crop_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 2;
SELECT id, name, planting_date, harvest_date, yield_kg FROM planting_dates JOIN harvest_yields ON planting_dates.crop_id = harvest_yields.crop_id ORDER BY yield_kg DESC, planting_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM crop_types;
SELECT crop_name, crop_id FROM crop_types WHERE crop_id = 1;
SELECT farm_id, farm_name FROM farm WHERE farm_name LIKE 'Farm A%';
SELECT field_name, soil_type FROM fields WHERE soil_type IN ('Clay', 'Loam') ORDER BY field_name;

SELECT planting_date, crop_name, yield_amount FROM planting_dates JOIN crop_types ON planting_dates.crop_id = crop_types.crop_id JOIN harvest_yields ON planting_dates.field_id = harvest_yields.field_id;
SELECT * FROM crop_types;
SELECT field_id, field_name, soil_type FROM fields WHERE soil_type = 'Clay';
SELECT crop_name, planting_date FROM planting_dates ORDER BY planting_date DESC;
SELECT farm_id, farm_name, COUNT(DISTINCT field_id) AS total_fields FROM farm INNER JOIN fields ON farm.farm_id = fields.field_id GROUP BY farm_id;
SELECT crop_name, SUM(yield_amount) AS total_yield FROM crop_types INNER JOIN harvest_yields ON crop_types.crop_id = harvest_yields.crop_id GROUP BY crop_name ORDER BY total_yield DESC;
